How many of us want to finish school and run home?

How many of us enjoy school?

School can be fun. School can be an adventure.

Imagine the fun you would have if a magician walked into your school.

He would show you tricks. Magic tricks. Juggle rings in the air.

Pull rabbits out of his hat. 

Make things disappear. Bring things out of nowhere. But what if a snake entered your school? Where would you be?

Listen to what happened in Meera's school.
